text: Antichrist Superstar is the second studio album by American rock band, Marilyn Manson. It was released on October 8, 1996. The producers of the album were Trent Reznor, Dave Ogilvie, Marilyn Manson and Sean Beavan. There were many protest from religious and civic groups such as the American Family Association because of the band's anti-Christian views. ==Songs== Category:1996 albums Category:Marilyn Manson albums Category:Concept albums
title: Antichrist Superstar
